main.description:
The best seats in the house to witness Coron’s majestic sunsets are at the Sunset Villas. Located on a private beach and backed by the island’s nature reserve, quintessential simple pleasures abound in this private enclave.

The Sunset Villa is available in three categories – Deluxe, Standard and Premier. The Standard Villa is 20 square meters in size; a perfect haven for couples. The Deluxe Villa is 34 square meters in size and can accommodate a maximum of four persons; an ideal hideaway for families or group of friends. The Premier Villa is a spacious 60 square meter ‘home away from home’ perfect for a romantic getaway for two or a fun island adventure for friends and family.
main.features:
Air-Conditioned Single Detached Cottage

Queen Size Bed – Standard Villa

King Size Bed or Two Queen Size Beds – Deluxe Villa

King Size Bed – Premier Villa

Provision for Extra Beds

Bedroom Area with Bathroom En-suite

Receiving Area

Walk-in Closet – Deluxe Villa

Electric Kettle

Intercom

Minibar

Mini Refrigerator

Cotton Towels

Hair Dryer

Hot and Cold Shower

Housekeeping Services

Safety Deposit Box

In-room Dining

Turndown Service

main.description:
Stylishly designed Sunrise Villas at Club Paradise Resort in Palawan offer breathtaking surrounds and direct access to the island’s fragrant flora and sun-kissed talcum sand. The Sunrise Villa is available in three categories – Standard, Deluxe and Premier.

The Standard Villa is a 35 square meter villa perfect for reconnecting with nature. Wake up to beautiful mornings of lush greens and cascading shades of blue each day. Step out and you will be greeted by the soothing sound of the wind blowing through the trees and hills.

The Deluxe Villa is an ideal retreat for family getaways. This 35 square meter villa is tastefully furnished, spacious and serene. It is tucked amidst the island’s lush greenery, unspoiled velveteen sand, and fronts some of the most beautiful, crystal clear waters in Palawan.

The Premier Villa offers a stunning view of the sunrise and the neighboring Malpagalen Island. Perfect for a group of 4 persons, this 46 square meter villa has a comfy king and day bed. At the veranda is a hammock where you can relax while enjoying the cool ocean breeze and breathtaking sights.
main.features:
• Air-Conditioned Duplex Cottage
  • King Sized Bed – Standard and Deluxe
  • Extra King Size Bed – Premier Villa
  • Bedroom Area with Bathroom En-suite
  • Receiving Area
  • Electric Kettle
  • Intercom
  • Minibar
  • Mini Refrigerator
  • Cotton Towels
  • Hair Dryer
  • Hot and Cold Shower
  • Housekeeping Services
  • Safety Deposit Box
  • In-room Dining
  • Turndown Service

main.description: Step into your tranquil suite and begin the rituals of rest and relaxation. With its laid-back charm, earthy palette matched  with cool and calming blue hues, our Oceanview Suite offers a relaxing respite from the demands of the real world. It is conveniently located next to the stunning, jungle-fringed stretch of the beach and preludes to a captivating hike among Coron’s tropical foliage, with the suites at the top floor offering one of the best views on the island.
main.features:
• 40 sqm Air-Conditioned Suite
  • Private Balcony
  • Two Queen Size Beds or One King Size Bed
  • A Day Bed
  • 50-inch Smart TV
  • Bedroom Area with En-suite Bathroom
  • Electric Kettle
  • Nespresso Machine
  • Intercom
  • Minibar (available upon request)
  • Mini Refrigerator
  • Cotton Towels
  • Hair Dryer
  • Hot and Cold Shower
  • Housekeeping Services
  • Flat Iron with Ironing Board
  • Safety Deposit Box
  • In-room Dining
  • Turndown Service

main.description: An idyllic escape set in the midst of luxurious tropical shrubbery boasts of the island’s enchanting allure and modern conveniences. Relax on your own private balcony with elevated views of the garden or sink into your bed and drift away to the sounds of tropical birds. This multi-storey structure showcases minimalist design and neutral colors that exude beauty and functionality.
